subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] EVP questions can anyone help ?
author: Laura Kimberley
full_text:
Hi Lyn, welcome, glad you're here. Were all fairly experienced researcher's
of course some more than others.
What's your questions Girl friend? We're here to help and educate. Maybe you
can share some of your files.
If you would like make a folder with your name and upload the files to here
in mp3 format if you can.

Again we welcome you in discussion
Laura.

-----Original Message-----
From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
Lyn
Sent: Sunday, March 30, 2008 3:03 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC] EVP questions_can anyone help ?

HI
I'm one of the quiet members here.  trying to learn from everyone.
I have activity in my home. so I purchased an RCA digital recorder
which is amazing.
I have captured several EVPs, some quite clear, some a bit too fast
so I slow it down to hear it. some are voices , some answer questions, some 
are just noises.

does anyone have experience with EVPs on digital recorders ?
I have a ton of questions...  and need advice on some of them.

thanks
Lyn
angels4lyn@...
